struct lov_user_ost_data_v1 llot_objects [0]

Detailed Description

An Opaque data type abstracting the layout of a Lustre file.

Duplicate the fields we care about from struct lov_user_md_v3. Deal with v1 versus v3 format issues only when we read or write files.

Definition at line 48 of file liblustreapi_layout.c.
